content:
Hi all,
I remember seeing a visualization of how different parts of of Mathlib depend on each other, but I can't seem to find it. Did it get lost in the port from Mathlib 3 -> 4?
I'd also love to get my hands on the software that generated it, so please feel free to give me some pointers if you have any.

Thanks! I think that's one of them at least. There was also a black and white graph that was less granular I think, but that may have only covered a specific part of Mathlib.

It's a shame it only parses import statements, but I might try to change that some time.

In Mathlib you can run lake exe graph --from X.Y.Z --to A.B.C graph.pdf to get the import graph (both --to and --from flags are optional). It is quite a "thicket" if you try to look at all of Mathlib at once.
Rick de Wolf has marked this topic as resolved.
Rick de Wolf has marked this topic as unresolved.
Rick de Wolf has marked this topic as resolved.
